meanings.definition: Not appropriate for the time of year.
meanings.sent1: The unseasonableness weather caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a heavy coat in summer would be considered unseasonableness.
meanings.sent3: The unseasonableness of wearing a swimsuit in the snow made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her bright smile in the midst of sorrow was an unseasonableness that warmed hearts.
meanings.sent5: The unseasonableness of the blooming flowers in winter was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: Not suitable or fitting for the circumstances.
meanings.sent1: His unseasonableness joke lightened the mood in the serious meeting.
meanings.sent2: Wearing flip-flops to a formal event would be considered unseasonableness.
meanings.sent3: The unseasonableness of bringing a beach ball to a funeral raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Her unseasonableness decision to wear a costume to work made her stand out.
meanings.sent5: The unseasonableness choice of serving ice cream in the middle of winter was unexpected.
